page.title: 05CHILDREN'S GAMES(BOYS)
page.content: BOYS AND GIRLS CAN PLAY MANY{GAMES TOGETHER.HERE ARE SOME:- MARBLES KNOCKEY-NINE-DOORS TIGGY(CHASEY) ROUNDERS HIDE AND SEEK. MANY OF THESE WERE ONCE ONLY PLAYED BY BOYS BUT NOW{GIRLS}JOIN IN.HERE ARE SOME GAMES THAT ONLY BOYS PLAY:- BRITISH BULLDOG TIGGY TORTURE BEST MAN FALLS SLAM CONKERS. {SLAM:-}IN THIS GAME BOYS KICK A BALL ONTO A WALL.AS THE BALL COMES BACK THE NEXT BOY HAS TO KICK IT ONCE ONLY.IF HE MISSES THE WALL HE IS OUT. {MARBLES:-}THERE ARE MANY WAYS TO PLAY THIS GAME.IN OUR AREA ,THE PEOPLE PLAYING HAVE TO GET THEIR MARBLE AND EVERYONE ELSES MARBLE INTO A SPACE USUALLY ON A MANHOLE COVER.IF THEY MISS,THEN THE NEXT PERSON TRIES. USUALLY,ALOT OF MARBLES ARE PUT IN AND THESE ARE "PLAYED FOR".
